channel.title: Can you imagine wow on 360?
channel.description: if blizzard ever decided to put wow on 360, would this be a good idea? and maybe they could add the ability to use a keyboard for typing and whatnot. and they could link thier pc servers with the the xbox 360. would this sound like a good idea to you? or no? also tell me what you would add if you were working on a project like this.

item.title: Can you imagine wow on 360?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

They could be intelligent and drop WoW already to move on for a decent MMORPG

Read full topic

item.title: Can you imagine wow on 360?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Ummm…or they could be original and make a whole new different game. Sounds better to me.

item.title: Can you imagine wow on 360?
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

Mattymat1313:

if blizzard ever decided to put wow on 360, would this be a good idea? and maybe they could add the ability to use a keyboard for typing and whatnot. and they could link thier pc servers with the the xbox 360. would this sound like a good idea to you? or no? also tell me what you would add if you were working on a project like this.

YA! Me and my company are making this game right now to use for the XBOX 360 ,it’s called AoW… AGE OF WOW.
